history.title: Our History
history.content: La Dolores was born from a family tradition that spans several generations. Since our beginnings, we have been dedicated to the artisanal production of premium beverages, keeping alive the essence and secrets passed down through time.

tradition.title: Tradition
tradition.description: We keep alive the traditional recipes and methods that have made La Dolores unique.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We carefully select each ingredient to ensure excellence in every bottle.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We combine tradition with modern techniques to constantly improve our products.

process.title: Our Process
process.content: Each La Dolores product is the result of a meticulous production process. From the selection of raw materials to the final bottling, each step is carried out with dedication and attention to detail.

vermutRojo.shortDescription: Our artisanal red vermouth, crafted with a careful selection of aromatic herbs and spices. A traditional and balanced flavor that captures the essence of our legacy.

vermutBlanco.shortDescription: A smooth and balanced white vermouth with citrus and herbal notes. Perfect for aperitif or as a base for refreshing cocktails.

vinoTinto.shortDescription: Aged red wine with notes of ripe red fruits, spices, and a touch of oak. An elegant wine that reflects our terroir.
